Variables.name: max_building_height
Variables.description: Jurisdictionally defined maximum permitted building height for the site

Variables.name: protrusion_above_max_height
Variables.description: Vertical distance the antenna extends above the maximum building height

Conditions.text: Television and radio antennas may extend above the maximum building height by no more than 15 ft.

Relationships.text: Listed under 'Allowable daylight plane protrusions summary'; this row measures allowance relative to maximum building height, not explicitly to the daylight plane.

exclusions: Chimneys or flues with width >= 5 ft

Variables.name: width
Variables.description: Maximum cross-sectional width of the chimney or flue

Variables.name: required_clearance_per_code
Variables.description: Minimum required clearance as specified by Building Code Chapter 16.04

Variables.name: protrusion_beyond_daylight_plane
Variables.description: Extent of feature extending beyond the daylight plane

then.text: Feature may extend beyond the daylight plane only as necessary to meet the minimum required clearance of Building Code (Chapter 16.04).

Exceptions.effect: This allowance does not apply; no protrusion beyond daylight plane authorized by this rule.

Relationships.dependency_detail: Minimum clearances defined therein determine permissible extent of protrusion.

Variables.name: feature_length
Variables.description: Length of an individual feature measured along the plane/facade/roof line

Variables.name: cumulative_length_all_features
Variables.description: Sum of lengths of all applicable features

Variables.name: separation_between_features_each_side
Variables.description: Clear distance between adjacent features on each side

Variables.name: feature_height
Variables.description: Height of the feature (datum unclear in source text)

Constants.name: max_feature_height
Constants.note: The string 'height ≤ 24'' appears exactly; datum for height measurement is unclear.

Conditions.text: Each feature length shall be less than or equal to 7.5 ft.
The cumulative length of all features shall be less than or equal to 15 ft.
Minimum separation between features on each side shall be at least 5 ft.
Conditions.ambiguity_note: Phrase 'on each side' is unclear; it may refer to separation from adjacent features in both directions along the facade/roof or to other elements. Clarify measurement axis and reference points.

Conditions.text: Feature height shall be less than or equal to 24 ft.
Conditions.ambiguity_note: Source states 'height ≤ 24'' without specifying datum (grade, roof, daylight plane). Clarification required.

Relationships.text: Cumulative length constraint applies across all features listed in applicability within the same context/plane.

Variables.name: protrusion_beyond_daylight_plane
Variables.description: Perpendicular distance the feature extends beyond the daylight plane

Conditions.text: Cornices, eaves, and similar architectural features may protrude beyond the daylight plane by no more than 2 ft.

Exceptions.condition: Feature is a flat or continuous wall or an enclosure usable for interior space
Exceptions.effect: This allowance does not apply; no protrusion authorized by this rule.
